name: TC Cannon vs. Werdna: RACING!!!
description:
TC Cannon vs. Werdna: RACING!!! is a top-down 2D racing game for two players, featuring an original cast of characters created by my friend Tyler and I  back in High School (plz donut steel).  Be the first player to complete 20 laps around Finger Bang Circuit.  Avoid incoming missiles, and try to shoot down your opponents before they get the leg up on you.  Completing laps and getting hit by missiles will result in personalized quips from your character.

Made with Unity.

Controls:
Hold RT to accelerate
LS to move while accelerating
Press A to fire a missile
Press start when the race is over to return to character select.
